Text: Invitation to Attend Wharton Forum on EBusiness Meeting on Decem ber thJeff and Vince Raffi Amit would like to invite you to attend the Tuesday December th portion of the Wharton Forum meeting These Forum sessions are ordinarily only open to WeBI Partners and Members of the Forum on EBusiness but exceptions are occasionally made for invited guests You can view a copy of the agenda for our upcoming meeting on the Forum website agendaagenhtml Please also let me know if you would be interested in joining our dinner with Jeremy Rifkin as our keynote speaker I hope you will be able to join us for an engaging day Robin Robin Hartley Associate Director Wharton Electronic Business Initiative University of Pennsylvania Vance Hall Room Spruce Street Philadelphia PA tel fax
